```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}

teams <- read_csv("teams.csv")
rosters24 <- read_csv("rosters_2024.csv")
rosters_msoc <- read_csv("rosters_msoc_2024.csv") |> mutate(ncaa_id = as.numeric(ncaa_id))

msoc_keep <- rosters_msoc |> filter(!is.na(url))

combined_rosters <- bind_rows(rosters24, msoc_keep)

unique_roster_teams <- combined_rosters |> distinct(ncaa_id)

need_rosters <- teams |> anti_join(unique_roster_teams)

write_csv(combined_rosters, "combined_rosters_2024.csv")

```


```{r}
adds <- read_csv("adds.csv")

combined_with_adds <- bind_rows(combined_rosters, adds)
```
